WorkItem.Description: When I add the Automapper assembly as reference to my project, I get an error about it requiring System.Web. I don't see why this would be the case of a way around it.

Comments.Message: I am getting the same error.  Will this work with a WPF applicatinon?
Looks like this came from adding Castle reference.  I'm going to switch back to LinFu for proxy creation, which didn't have this problem.

NDepend says that it's from Castle.Core.Logging's WebLogger class that references HttpContext.

Castle.Core 2.5.1 and above no longer have this class, so would not require a reference to System.Web.

-dave
Seconding the question: will this work with a WPF application?
Ah of course it will.  Set Project -> Properties -> Application -> Target Framework to ".NET Framework 4" rather than ".NET Framework 4 Client Profile"
I just recompiled sources with Client Profile successfully. Would be nice if NuGet packages get updated.
